Package org.cesecore.certificates.util

Class AlgorithmTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.certificates.util.AlgorithmTools
  • public abstract class AlgorithmTools
extends Object
    Various helper methods for handling the mappings between different key and signature algorithms. This class has to be updated when new key or signature algorithms are added to EJBCA.
    Version:
    $Id: AlgorithmTools.java 28555 2018-03-27 07:19:14Z tarmo_r_helmes $
    See Also:
    AlgorithmConstants, KeyTools.getKeyLength(java.security.PublicKey)

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyAlgorithm

        public static String getKeyAlgorithm​(PublicKey publickey)
        Gets the name of matching key algorithm from a public key as defined by AlgorithmConstants.
        Parameters:
        publickey - Public key to find matching key algorithm for.
        Returns:
        Name of the matching key algorithm or null if no match.
        See Also:
        AlgorithmConstants.KEYALGORITHM_RSA, AlgorithmConstants.KEYALGORITHM_DSA, AlgorithmConstants.KEYALGORITHM_ECDSA

      • getAvailableKeyAlgorithms

        public static List<String> getAvailableKeyAlgorithms()
        Returns:
        a list of all available key algorithms

      • getNamedEcCurvesMap

        public static Map<String,​List<String>> getNamedEcCurvesMap​(boolean hasToBeKnownByDefaultProvider)
        Get unique available named elliptic curves and their aliases.
        Parameters:
        hasToBeKnownByDefaultProvider - if the curve name needs to be known by the default provider (e.g. so Sun PKCS#11 can use it)
        Returns:
        a Map with elliptic curve names as key and the key+any alias as the value.

      • getFlatNamedEcCurvesMap

        public static TreeMap<String,​String> getFlatNamedEcCurvesMap​(boolean hasToBeKnownByDefaultProvider)
        Get unique available named elliptic curves and their aliases.
        Parameters:
        hasToBeKnownByDefaultProvider - if the curve name needs to be known by the default provider (e.g. so Sun PKCS#11 can use it)
        Returns:
        a Map with elliptic curve names as key and the list of alias separated by '/' as the value.

      • getNistCurves

        public static List<String> getNistCurves()
        Gets a list of allowed curves (@see NIST curves).
        Returns:
        the list of allowed curves.

      • getNamedEcCurveBitLength

        public static int getNamedEcCurveBitLength​(String ecNamedCurve)
        Parameters:
        ecNamedCurve - Curve
        Returns:
        the number of bits a named elliptic curve has or 0 if the curve name is unknown.

      • getSignatureAlgorithms

        public static List<String> getSignatureAlgorithms​(PublicKey publickey)
        Gets a collection of signature algorithm names supported by the given key.
        Parameters:
        publickey - key to find supported algorithms for.
        Returns:
        Collection of zero or more signature algorithm names
        See Also:
        AlgorithmConstants

      • getKeyAlgorithmFromSigAlg

        public static String getKeyAlgorithmFromSigAlg​(String signatureAlgorithm)
        Gets the key algorithm matching a specific signature algorithm.
        Parameters:
        signatureAlgorithm - to get matching key algorithm for
        Returns:
        The key algorithm matching the signature or algorithm or the default if no matching was found.
        See Also:
        AlgorithmConstants

      • getKeySpecification

        public static String getKeySpecification​(PublicKey publicKey)
        Gets the key specification from a public key. Example: "2048" for a RSA or DSA key or "secp256r1" for EC key. The EC curve is only detected if publickey is an object known by the bouncy castle provider.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - The public key to get the key specification from
        Returns:
        The key specification, "unknown" if it could not be determined and null if the key algorithm is not supported

      • isNamedECKnownInDefaultProvider

        public static boolean isNamedECKnownInDefaultProvider​(String ecNamedCurveBc)
        Check if the curve name is known by the first found PKCS#11 provider or default (BC) (if no EC capable PKCS#11 provider were found)
        Parameters:
        ecNamedCurveBc - Curve
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getEcKeySpecOidFromBcName

        public static String getEcKeySpecOidFromBcName​(String ecNamedCurveBc)
        Convert from BC ECC curve names to the OID.
        Parameters:
        ecNamedCurveBc - the name as BC reports it
        Returns:
        the OID of the curve or the input curve name if it is unknown by BC

      • getEcKeySpecAliases

        public static List<String> getEcKeySpecAliases​(String namedEllipticCurve)
        Parameters:
        namedEllipticCurve - Curve name
        Returns:
        a list of aliases for the provided curve name (including the provided name)

      • getEncSigAlgFromSigAlg

        public static String getEncSigAlgFromSigAlg​(String signatureAlgorithm)
        Gets the algorithm to use for encryption given a specific signature algorithm. Some signature algorithms (i.e. DSA and ECDSA) can not be used for encryption so they are instead substituted with RSA with equivalent hash algorithm.
        Parameters:
        signatureAlgorithm - to find a encryption algorithm for
        Returns:
        an other encryption algorithm or same as signature algorithm if it can be used for encryption

      • isCompatibleSigAlg

        public static boolean isCompatibleSigAlg​(PublicKey publicKey,
                                         String signatureAlgorithm)
        Answers if the key can be used together with the given signature algorithm.
        Parameters:
        publicKey - public key to use
        signatureAlgorithm - algorithm to test
        Returns:
        true if signature algorithm can be used with the public key algorithm

      • getCertSignatureAlgorithmNameAsString

        public static String getCertSignatureAlgorithmNameAsString​(Certificate cert)
        Simple methods that returns the signature algorithm value from the certificate. Not usable for setting signature algorithms names in EJBCA, only for human presentation.
        Parameters:
        cert - certificate
        Returns:
        Signature algorithm name from the certificate as a human readable string, for example SHA1WithRSA.

      • getSignatureAlgorithm

        public static String getSignatureAlgorithm​(Certificate cert)
        Simple method that looks at the certificate and determines, from EJBCA's standpoint, which signature algorithm it is
        Parameters:
        cert - the cert to examine
        Returns:
        Signature algorithm name from AlgorithmConstants.SIGALG_SHA1_WITH_RSA etc.

      • getDigestFromSigAlg

        public static String getDigestFromSigAlg​(String sigAlg)
        Get the digest algorithm corresponding to the signature algorithm. This is used for the creation of PKCS7 file. SHA1 shall always be used, but it is not working with GOST which needs GOST3411 digest.
        Parameters:
        sigAlg - Algorithm
        Returns:
        name

      • getSignAlgOidFromDigestAndKey

        public static org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1ObjectIdentifier getSignAlgOidFromDigestAndKey​(String digestAlg,
                                                                                       String keyAlg)
        Calculates which signature algorithm to use given a key type and a digest algorithm
        Parameters:
        digestAlg - objectId of a digest algorithm, CMSSignedGenerator.DIGEST_SHA256 etc
        keyAlg - RSA, EC, DSA
        Returns:
        ASN1ObjectIdentifier with the id of PKCSObjectIdentifiers.sha1WithRSAEncryption, X9ObjectIdentifiers.ecdsa_with_SHA1, X9ObjectIdentifiers.id_dsa_with_sha1, etc

      • getAlgorithmNameFromDigestAndKey

        public static String getAlgorithmNameFromDigestAndKey​(String digestAlg,
                                                      String keyAlg)

      • isGost3410Enabled

        public static boolean isGost3410Enabled()

      • isDstu4145Enabled

        public static boolean isDstu4145Enabled()

      • isSigAlgEnabled

        public static boolean isSigAlgEnabled​(String sigAlg)

      • isKnownAlias

        public static boolean isKnownAlias​(String alias)
        Determine whether the curve alias given as argument is a known elliptic curve.
        Parameters:
        alias - an alias of the elliptic curve to look for
        Returns:
        true if the elliptic curve is known by this alias, false otherwise

      • getAllCurveAliasesFromAlias

        public static List<String> getAllCurveAliasesFromAlias​(String alias)

        Perform a case-insensitive lookup of all known aliases for an elliptic curve given one known alias.

        To determine whether an alias is known, see isKnownAlias(java.lang.String).

        Parameters:
        alias - alias
        Returns:
        a sorted list of aliases for the elliptic curve specified, never null

      • getAlgorithmNameFromOID

        public static String getAlgorithmNameFromOID​(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1ObjectIdentifier sigAlgOid)
        Returns the name of the algorithm corresponding to the specified OID
        Parameters:
        sigAlgOid - OID
        Returns:
        The name of the algorithm corresponding sigAlgOid or null if the algorithm is not recognized.
